alert.note: Alert for Hockley; Terry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 10:27PM CDT until May 27 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Terry County in northwestern Texas... Southwestern Hockley County in northwestern Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1027 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Levelland, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Levelland, Sundown and Locketville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
